title: Count Users by Age Group
markdown:
# **Count Users by Age Group**

## Table Schema

### Table Schema
| Column | Type    | Description |
|--------|---------|-------------|
| id     | INTEGER | Primary Key |
| name   | TEXT    | User Name   |
| age    | INTEGER | User Age    |

### Example

**Input:**
```
**users**
+----+---------+-----+
| id | name    | age |
+----+---------+-----+
| 1  | Alice   | 30  |
| 2  | Bob     | 20  |
| 3  | Charlie | 30  |
| 4  | Dave    | 20  |
+----+---------+-----+
```

**Expected Output:**
```
+-----+-------+
| age | count |
+-----+-------+
| 20  | 2     |
| 30  | 2     |
+-----+-------+
```

testCases.solutionSql: SELECT age, COUNT(*) as count FROM users GROUP BY age ORDER BY age ASC;
